titleproper.value:
Preliminary Inventory to the Squatters' Rights Collection: Roland Politi Papers
                    <num>TAM.364</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment staff

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2012-03-29T19:35-0400</date>

unittitle.value: Squatters' Rights Collection: Roland Politi Papers

p.value: Roland Politi is an Italian-born anarchist and artist who was involved in the 1980s squatters' rights movement in New York City's East Village which culminated in Tompkins Square Park Police Riot of August 1988.
PLEASE DIRECT FURTHER INQUIRIES TO: tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu

subject.value: Tompkins Square Park Riot, New York, N.Y., 1988.
